page.title: 19A Wetton Boy's Day
page.content: When I get up on Sunday, I help Grandad, then I take the milk churns. When I come back it is time for breakfast. I get the coke in and empty the bins. At about 10 o'clock I go with Grandad in the Land Rover to feed the sheep and count some of the cows. When I get back home I ride on my bike or help Dad. After dinner everybody sits down, so I usually see if Martin is in. If he is, I go up to his house on my bike. We sometimes go for a bike ride or do something inside. I go back home at about 4 o'clock. After tea I help Dad. At 7o'clock everyone has finished their work. I watch television and have a game of pool then I go to shut the hens up. I have some cornflakes or a hot drink for supper, then get ready for bed. In bed I may read a book before sleeping.
